library_info.name: Stadium Roof Design Library
library_info.description: Parametric tools for stadium roof structural design and analysis

workflows.name: Complete Stadium Roof Workflow
workflows.description: Full parametric workflow from base geometry generation through primary and secondary structural systems

steps.description: Generate base stadium roof geometry with parametric form control
Create primary structural truss system based on roof geometry
Add secondary bracing and lateral support elements

files.name: Stadium Roof Geometry Generator
files.description: Parametric generator for stadium roof base geometry. Creates complex curved or faceted roof forms with control over span, height, curvature, and segmentation.

inputs.name: roof_span
inputs.description: Overall span of the roof in meters

inputs.name: roof_height
inputs.description: Height at the center of the roof in meters

inputs.name: segments
inputs.description: Number of segments for roof divisions

outputs.name: eml_boundary_curves
outputs.description: Boundary curves of the roof perimeter

files.name: Primary Truss Generator
files.description: Generates primary structural truss elements based on span, height, and spacing parameters. Supports multiple truss types and configurations.

inputs.name: span_length
inputs.description: Length of individual truss span in meters

inputs.name: truss_height
inputs.description: Vertical height/depth of truss in meters

inputs.name: bay_spacing
inputs.description: Spacing between truss members in meters

outputs.name: eml_primary_truss_output_lines
outputs.description: Primary truss member lines ready for transfer

files.notes: Typically used after geometry generation. Requires base geometry reference.

files.name: Secondary Truss Generator
files.description: Generates secondary bracing elements that connect to and stabilize primary trusses. Provides lateral support and distributes loads.

inputs.name: brace_spacing
inputs.description: Spacing between secondary bracing members in meters

files.notes: Should be run after Primary Truss Generator. Requires primary truss geometry as input.
